title: Official website for Guru Kirpa Mill Industries (Nuts & Bolts Manufacturer)

requirements.text: Create a responsive official marketing website for “Guru Kirpa Mill Industries” (manufacturer of nuts & bolts) with clear navigation and SEO-friendly page structure.

quotes: guru kirpa mill industries manufacturer of nut bolt generate a offical website

acceptanceCriteria: Site loads as a public-facing company website with consistent header/navigation and footer
All pages are responsive (mobile/tablet/desktop) and accessible (semantic headings, keyboard navigation)
All user-facing text is in English

requirements.text: Implement core pages/sections: Home, About, Products (nuts/bolts categories with a simple catalog-style layout), Manufacturing/Infrastructure, Quality/Standards, and Contact.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links to each page/section and route changes work without full page reload
Products page shows multiple product categories with short descriptions and placeholder/spec fields (e.g., material/grade/finish/size range)
Contact page shows company contact details (address/phone/email placeholders) and a contact form

requirements.text: Add a contact/inquiry form that submits inquiries to the Motoko backend for storage, with user feedback (success/error) and basic validation (required fields).
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes: name, company (optional), email, phone (optional), message
Client-side validation prevents empty name/email/message and shows readable error messages
On submit, an inquiry record is persisted in the backend and the UI shows a success state

requirements.text: Implement Motoko backend inquiry storage with stable persistence and APIs to create an inquiry and list inquiries (for future admin use).
acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes an update method to create an inquiry with timestamp
Backend stores inquiries in stable state so they survive canister upgrades
Backend exposes a query method to list stored inquiries (may return all or paginated)

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual theme suitable for an industrial fasteners manufacturer: steel/graphite neutrals with a single accent color (not blue/purple), strong typography, and clean section-based layouts; use Tailwind consistently across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: A single, consistent theme (colors, typography, spacing, button styles) is used across all pages
Home page includes a hero section, key highlights (e.g., product range/quality/lead time placeholders), and a clear call-to-action leading to Contact
No blue/purple is used as the primary theme unless explicitly required by later user input

requirements.text: Add generated static brand and homepage imagery under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (logo + homepage hero/section visuals).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are committed under frontend/public/assets/generated
Header uses the generated logo asset
Home page uses the generated hero image and at least one additional generated visual element

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services)
Do not modify frontend paths designated as immutable by the platform (compose UI using existing components instead)
Do not use third-party auth providers; if authentication is ever needed, only Internet Identity is allowed (not required for this request)
nonGoals: E-commerce checkout, payments, or order management
Integration with external email/SMS sending services (store inquiries on-chain instead)

required: Minimal industrial logo mark with a nut/bolt motif, monochrome + accent variant (gkmi-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide homepage hero image featuring nuts/bolts with an industrial workshop feel, high contrast, neutral tones (hero-fasteners.dim_1920x800.png)
Set of simple line icons for homepage highlights (quality, manufacturing, delivery), consistent stroke style (icons-fasteners-set.dim_512x512.png)
